messages.content: Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with the first names of all employees.
SELECT firstname FROM employee
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
May I ask you to provide me with the first names of all employees?
SELECT firstname FROM employee
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Could you inform me about the different types of treatment available?
SELECT treatment_type FROM treatment GROUP BY treatment_type
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What types of treatment are there?
SELECT treatment_type FROM treatment GROUP BY treatment_type
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What appointments were there on May 7, 2020?
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE CAST(INTERVALSTART AS date) = '2020-05-07'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Could you please inform me regarding the scheduled appointments that were scheduled on May seven, 2020?
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE CAST(INTERVALSTART AS date) = '2020-05-07'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many employees do I have in my facility?
SELECT count(*) FROM employee

Could you inform me regarding the exact number of staff currently employed within my institutional setting?
SELECT count(*) FROM employee

SELECT * FROM patient WHERE housetype = 'EENGEZW'

SELECT function FROM employee WHERE abbreviation = 'Bosman'

SELECT top 5 * FROM appointment

Please provide me with all cancellations

SELECT sms_reminder FROM appointmenttype WHERE name = 'Opnamegesprek'

Is there advance notification via text message prior to an intake interview?

SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE referrerfixedtype = 'self_initiative'

Show me all appointments with the reference type self initiative

I want the first and last names of all male employees.
SELECT FIRSTNAME, surname FROM employee WHERE gender = 1
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Names of male employees.
SELECT FIRSTNAME, surname FROM employee WHERE gender = 1
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What kind of organization is Altrecht?

SELECT referrerorganization.NAME as organization_name, referrerorganizationtype.NAME as organization_type FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerorganizationtype on referrerorganizationtype.id = referrerorganization.referrerorganizationtype_id WHERE referrerorganization.NAME = 'Altrecht'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can you explain to me what kind of organization Altrecht is?

SELECT referrerorganization.NAME as organization_name, referrerorganizationtype.NAME as organization_type FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerorganizationtype on referrerorganizationtype.id = referrerorganization.referrerorganizationtype_id WHERE referrerorganization.NAME = 'Altrecht'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with a list of all health insurance companies and their phone numbers.
SELECT name, telephone FROM systemsocietynl
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
I request that you provide me with an exhaustive inventory of all health insurance companies, as well as their corresponding phone numbers.
SELECT name, telephone FROM systemsocietynl
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with all IDs of patients who are not currently insured.
SELECT patient_id, expiration_date, insured FROM insurancenl WHERE YEAR(expiration_date) = '9999' and insured = 'nee'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Would you please provide me with the identification numbers of those who do not currently have a valid insurance policy?
SELECT patient_id, expiration_date, insured FROM insurancenl WHERE YEAR(expiration_date) = '9999' and insured = 'nee'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What was the first appointment?
SELECT * FROM appointment ORDER BY intervalstart LIMIT 1

Which appointment was the first appointment?
SELECT * FROM appointment ORDER BY intervalstart LIMIT 1

Please show me all staff with a Tenzinger email address
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%tenzinger%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all staff members with a Tenzinger-affiliated email address.
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%tenzinger%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all appointments from 2023, starting with the most recent.
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 ORDER BY created DESC
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all appointments made in 2023, with the newest appointment at the top.
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 ORDER BY created DESC
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me the registration date, first and last name, care plan name and care plan start date of clients with care plans.
SELECT patient.firstnames, patient.given_name, patient.entry_date, carepathway.name, carepathway.startdate FROM patient INNER JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me the enrollment date and names of clients, and name and care pathway start date of clients currently participating in a care pathway.
SELECT patient.firstnames, patient.given_name, patient.entry_date, carepathway.name, carepathway.startdate FROM patient INNER JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Retrieve all IDs of patients where 'brummel' appears in the last name.
SELECT id FROM PATIENT WHERE lower(surname) LIKE '%brummel%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Obtain the identification numbers of patients in which the word 'brummel' is part of the last name.
SELECT id FROM PATIENT WHERE lower(surname) LIKE '%brummel%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all patients and their privacy objections
SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me a list of all patients including their privacy concerns
SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many psychiatrists do we have in our database?
SELECT count(function) FROM employee WHERE lower(function) like '%psychiater%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many psychiatrists are registered in our data?
SELECT count(function) FROM employee WHERE lower(function) like '%psychiater%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me the list of patients without privacy concerns

SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.referrer_id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.privacy_objections = 'nee'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Give me all the patients who have no privacy concerns

SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.referrer_id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.privacy_objections = 'nee'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
I want to know from all appointments after 2019 how many appointments per type there have been

SELECT appointmenttype.NAME, count(*) FROM appointmenttype LEFT JOIN appointment on appointment.appointmenttype_id = appointmenttype.id WHERE appointment.INTERVALSTART >= '2020-01-01' GROUP BY appointmenttype.NAME
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
I request a list of the number of appointments, broken down by type, that took place after the year 2019.

SELECT appointmenttype.NAME, count(*) FROM appointmenttype LEFT JOIN appointment on appointment.appointmenttype_id = appointmenttype.id WHERE appointment.INTERVALSTART >= '2020-01-01' GROUP BY appointmenttype.NAME
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which organization does I. Hendriksen work for?

SELECT referrerindividual.INITIALS, referrerindividual.SURNAME, referrerorganization.NAME FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerindividual on referrerindividual.referrerorganization_id = referrerorganization.id WHERE referrerindividual.INITIALS = 'I' and referrerindividual.SURNAME = 'Hendriksen'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which organization does I. Hendriksen work for?

SELECT referrerindividual.INITIALS, referrerindividual.SURNAME, referrerorganization.NAME FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerindividual on referrerindividual.referrerorganization_id = referrerorganization.id WHERE referrerindividual.INITIALS = 'I' and referrerindividual.SURNAME = 'Hendriksen'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please give me the IDs and names of the patients who started the depression pathway after 2018.

SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE LOWER(carepathway.name) = 'depressie' and YEAR(carepathway.startdate) > 2018
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me the IDs and names of the patients who started the depression pathway after the year 2018.

SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE LOWER(carepathway.name) = 'depressie' and YEAR(carepathway.startdate) > 2018
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me of all patients their IDs, names and in which municipality they live

SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname, systemmunicipality.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN systempostalcode on systempostalcode.postalcode = IFF(patient.deleted='ja', '0000', LEFT(patient.postal_code,4)) LEFT JOIN systempostalcode_systemmunicipality on systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systempostalcode_id = systempostalcode.id LEFT JOIN systemmunicipality on systemmunicipality.id = systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systemmunicipality_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with the identification numbers, full names and municipalities of all patients

SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname, systemmunicipality.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN systempostalcode on systempostalcode.postalcode = IFF(patient.deleted='ja', '0000', LEFT(patient.postal_code,4)) LEFT JOIN systempostalcode_systemmunicipality on systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systempostalcode_id = systempostalcode.id LEFT JOIN systemmunicipality on systemmunicipality.id = systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systemmunicipality_id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Provide me with the insurance company of patient 53

SELECT systemsocietynl.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id WHERE patient.id = 53
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please grant me access to client 53's insurance company.

SELECT systemsocietynl.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id WHERE patient.id = 53
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which appointments involve clients who have not yet been notified?
SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%niet aangemeld%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which appointments involve clients who are not yet enrolled?
SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%niet aangemeld%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please show me all dental insurance policies that provide additional coverage
SELECT * FROM societypackage WHERE coverage_type = 'aanvullend' and lower(package_name) LIKE '%tand%' and lower(package_name) NOT LIKE '%standaard%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all supplemental dental insurance policies
SELECT * FROM societypackage WHERE coverage_type = 'aanvullend' and lower(package_name) LIKE '%tand%' and lower(package_name) NOT LIKE '%standaard%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me all employees with a Medicore email address that have a landline phone number starting with 030
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%medicore%' and phonehome LIKE '030%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me the list of employees with a Medicore email address whose landline phone number starts with the digit sequence 030.
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%medicore%' and phonehome LIKE '030%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Provide me with all appointments created in 2023 within the clinic, with the oldest appointment created at the top
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 and address_type = 'clinic' ORDER BY created
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me an ordered view of appointments within the clinic created in the year 2023, ordered by initial creation date, with the earliest created appointment shown first.
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 and address_type = 'clinic' ORDER BY created
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Display the IDs of the first 250 healthcare providers imported, sorted by last name.
SELECT id FROM systemcaregiver WHERE imported = 1 ORDER BY surname LIMIT 250
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Retrieve the IDs of the first 250 caregivers imported, sorted by last name.
SELECT id FROM systemcaregiver WHERE imported = 1 ORDER BY surname LIMIT 250
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Give me the number of unique clients and insurance policies with coverage type basic that are currently valid.

SELECT count(DISTINCT patient.id), count(DISTINCT insurancenl.id) FROM patient INNER JOIN insurancenl on patient.id = insurancenl.patient_id WHERE insurancenl.coverage_type = 'basis' and current_date between insurancenl.starting_date and insurancenl.expiration_date
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many unique clients and unique insureds are currently in possession of a valid basic insurance policy?

SELECT count(DISTINCT patient.id), count(DISTINCT insurancenl.id) FROM patient INNER JOIN insurancenl on patient.id = insurancenl.patient_id WHERE insurancenl.coverage_type = 'basis' and current_date between insurancenl.starting_date and insurancenl.expiration_date
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please show me all appointments that have been cancelled.
SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%geannuleerd%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please show me a summary of cancelled appointments.
SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%geannuleerd%'
